players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night and found to be one. We need to vote him out."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time, but I urge everyone to keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making any hasty decisions."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night and found to be one. We need to vote him out."

Charlie: "I'm surprised that Diana has already accused me of being the mafioso. However, I still believe it's important for us to gather more information before making any decisions. Let's try to keep an open mind and consider all possibilities."
